name: playwright
description: Browser automation via provider client. Navigate pages, take screenshots, extract text and links, fill forms, and evaluate JavaScript snippets. Layer 1 skill using provider client for browser access. HIGH RISK: URL allowlist enforced, no arbitrary code execution.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: playwright
toolDefinition.description: Browser automation via provider client. Navigate pages, take screenshots, extract text/links, fill forms, and evaluate JavaScript. Layer 1 skill using provider client (BYOK). HIGH RISK: URL allowlist enforced.

action.description: navigate (go to URL), screenshot (capture page image), get_text (extract text content), get_links (extract links), fill_form (fill form fields), evaluate (run JS snippet on page)

url.description: Target URL (must be http:// or https://). Required for all actions.

fullPage.description: Capture full page screenshot (default false). Used with screenshot action.

format.description: Screenshot image format (default png). Used with screenshot action.

selector.description: CSS selector to target specific element (max 200 chars). Used with get_text action.

limit.description: Maximum number of links to return (1-500, default 100). Used with get_links action.

fields.description: Array of { selector, value } objects for form filling (max 50). Used with fill_form action.

script.description: JavaScript code to evaluate on the page (max 2000 chars). Used with evaluate action. Script is sent to provider, not executed locally.
